body_html:
+1 I also am experiencing this in 1.6 under Ubuntu 16.04.
This is a critical bug, as it makes all gpu options unusable - I can no longer select which GPU I am using.

This only started occurring with recent builds - code that used to work now errors out if I try to select a GPU.

body:
+1 I also am experiencing this in 1.6 under Ubuntu 16.04.
This is a critical bug, as it makes all gpu options unusable - I can no longer select which GPU I am using.

This only started occurring with recent builds - code that used to work now errors out if I try to select a GPU.
